title: Juan Ignacio Aranda
text: Juan Ignacio Aranda (born Juan Ignacio López Aranda on February 6, 1962 in <a href="Mexico%20City">Mexico City</a>, <a href="Mexico">Mexico</a>) is a <a href="Mexicans">Mexican</a> actor. He began his training in 1978 in Centro de Arte Dramático (CADAC), also studied in The Cockpit Arts Workshop and in The City Lit (London), in Centro Universitario de Teatro of <a href="National%20Autonomous%20University%20of%20Mexico">Universidad Nacional Autónoma de México</a> (UNAM) and in United States International University in <a href="San%20Diego">San Diego</a>, <a href="California">California</a>.
